mapper.select: SELECT tt.タスク管理id AS ID, tt.タスク名 AS taskname, tt.開始日 AS startdate, tt.期日 AS deadlinedate, tt.かかる時間 AS Requiredtime, tt.内容 AS content, tt.コメント AS coment, tp.優先度名 AS priority FROM t_tasks tt INNER JOIN t_priorities tp ON tt.優先度 = tp.優先度ID WHERE タスク管理id = #{taskID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT 内容 AS content, 小タスクID AS SmallID, タスク管理ID AS TaskID, 完了フラグ AS compleate FROM t_small_task WHERE タスク管理id = #{taskID, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND 削除フラグ = FALSE
